Package cams.replier.replier_controller

Class StaffReplierController

java.lang.Object
cams.replier.replier_controller.StaffReplierController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReplierController, java.io.Serializable
public class StaffReplierController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReplierController, java.io.Serializable
Class provides specific implementation of reply functionality to enquiries. It extends ReplierUI and provides the implementation for the reply method.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • reply

      public boolean reply​(User user, int postIndex, java.lang.String content)
      Replies to a specific enquiry made by a user. This method checks if a reply already exists for the specified post and, if not, adds a message of the type reply to the post. It then saves the changes to the associated camp.
      Specified by:
      reply in interface ReplierController
      Parameters:
      user - The user who is replying.
      postIndex - The index of the post in the user's list of enquiries to reply to.
      content - The content of the reply.
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getEnquiries

      public java.util.List<Post> getEnquiries​(User user)
      Collects all enquiries related to the camps created by the staff member.
      Specified by:
      getEnquiries in interface ReplierController
      Returns:
      A list of Post objects representing enquiries.
